conbody.p: Submit the proposed waiver via DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 225.7009-4 - Ball and Roller Bearings Restriction Waiver.” The waiver will be in the form of a written D&F containing a certification that:
(a) Adequate domestic supplies are not available to meet DOD requirements on a timely basis; and
(b) The acquisition must be made in order to acquire capability for national security purposes.
